titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation Program.
A bill to reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to reauthorize for FY2017-FY2023 the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation Fund Grant Program.
